Posted By: Mac Wubben
I thought it was interesting that the Schulte looks like an obvious re-back.  I’m not an expert on it, but you can clearly see another back underneath the red cross back.  Has anyone else noticed this?  Are they all like that?

Posted By: leon
easy to see it's an underprint [IMG]https://www.net54baseball.com/images/happy.gif[/IMG]  .....good luck with the sales. Red Crosses are great!!
